descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][img]http://i.imgur.com/GiAZZOi.jpg?1[/img]

[color=#ff7700]- Mod Description -[/color][/size]

An lore-friendly and script-free Overhaul of the city of Riften.

[color=#e69138][size=5]- Videos -[/size][/color]

By Brodual.
[youtube]x4NUc9c3J8I[/youtube]

By Hodilton.
[youtube]_ogiKpFNkUM[/youtube]
 
By TESHDVideos.
[youtube]CM2Dp_vVJhw[/youtube]

By Sidras01
[youtube]KXxnGWH4Ixc[/youtube]

[/b][color=#ff7700][b][size=5]- Performance -[/size][/b]
[/color]
[size=3]My Rig: Asus P8B75-M/CSM Motherboard, Intel I7 2600 @ 3.4 GHz
[/size]8 Gb RAM, NVidia GTX 680 2 Gb, running alongside Somber 3 ENB + 1024 Textures and I get [color=#e69138]45 FPS[/color] average.

[size=5][b][color=#ff7700]- Installation -[/color] [/b][/size]

Use NMM to install, simply double-click the mod in the "Mods" tab of NMM after it has finished downloading or Download manually and open the .rar file. Place the DATA folder into your SKYRIM folder, click "yes" to merge folders. Activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp.

[b][color=#ff7700][size=5]- Load Order -[/size][/color][/b]

Setting the right load order for your mods is a crucial step to enjoying a stable modded game. The Load Order Optimisation Tool [color=#e69138]([b]LOOT[/b])[/color] can help with that, by providing automated load order sorting that's simple to use and fully customisable.

[b][color=#ff7700][size=5]- Requirements -[/size][/color][/b]

- Skyrim up to date

[b][color=#ff7700][size=5]- Not Compatible Mods:[/size][/color]

[/b]- Mods that change the city of Riften (with the exception of texture mods)
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8058/?]Open Cities[/url] by Arthmoor.

[color=#ff7700][size=5][b]- Compatible:[/b][/size][/color]

[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53541/?]Thief player home in Riften Canal[/url][/size]  by Elianora
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58159/?]Riften Canal Exit[/url] by [b]SparrowPrince[/b]

[b][color=#ff7700][size=5]- Future Plans -[/size][/color][/b]

Add a guard or two to the new gate, more [color=#e69138]rope ladders??[/color],[color=#e69138] [/color]small fixes etc.

[color=#ff7700][size=5][b]- Recommended mods -[/b][/size][/color]
